Bio

I am a junior front end web developer working out of Carlsbad, Ca. I had been working as a security guard who had served in the military for 8 years until 2016. That year I ended up having brain surgery and after a year made a full recovery. After not having to deal with constant headaches and migraines anymore I dove into something I loved, web design. Completely self-taught I am highly-motivated, hard working and self driven. I enjoy learning new technologies and am very prideful about my work.
